languages.text: "Сила воли и грация. Печально, что подобные дары достались той, чью душу никогда не осветит свет Терры".
"Grace and strength of will. It is sad that such gifts have fallen to one whose soul will never be illuminated by the light of Terra."
languages.original_text: "Сила воли и грация. Печально, что подобные дары достались той, чью душу никогда не осветит свет Терры".

traits.locale_text: "Grace and strength of will. It is sad that such gifts have fallen to one whose soul will never be illuminated by the light of Terra."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Grace and strength of will. It is sad that such gifts have fallen to one whose soul will never be illuminated by the light of Terra."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “多么优雅而坚强的意志。只可惜，这样的天赋葬送在了一个可悲的灵魂身上，永远无福消受泰拉之光的照耀。”
languages.original_text: "Grace and strength of will. It is sad that such gifts have fallen to one whose soul will never be illuminated by the light of Terra."

traits.locale_text: “多么优雅而坚强的意志。只可惜，这样的天赋葬送在了一个可悲的灵魂身上，永远无福消受泰拉之光的照耀。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « La grâce et la force de la volonté. Quel dommage que de tels dons soient tombés entre les mains d'une âme qui jamais ne pourra connaître la lumière de Terra... »
languages.original_text: "Grace and strength of will. It is sad that such gifts have fallen to one whose soul will never be illuminated by the light of Terra."

traits.locale_text: « La grâce et la force de la volonté. Quel dommage que de tels dons soient tombés entre les mains d'une âme qui jamais ne pourra connaître la lumière de Terra... »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Anmut und Willenskraft. Ein Jammer, dass solche Gaben jemandem zugefallen sind, dessen Seele niemals von Terras Licht erhellt werden wird."
languages.original_text: "Grace and strength of will. It is sad that such gifts have fallen to one whose soul will never be illuminated by the light of Terra."

traits.locale_text: "Anmut und Willenskraft. Ein Jammer, dass solche Gaben jemandem zugefallen sind, dessen Seele niemals von Terras Licht erhellt werden wird."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「恩寵と意志の強さ。そのような贈り物が、魂が地球の光に照らされることのない者の手に渡ったことは悲しいことね」
languages.original_text: "Grace and strength of will. It is sad that such gifts have fallen to one whose soul will never be illuminated by the light of Terra."

traits.locale_text: 「恩寵と意志の強さ。そのような贈り物が、魂が地球の光に照らされることのない者の手に渡ったことは悲しいことね」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Gracia y fuerza de voluntad. Es una lástima que semejantes dones recaigan sobre alguien que nunca recibirá la luz de Terra».
languages.original_text: "Grace and strength of will. It is sad that such gifts have fallen to one whose soul will never be illuminated by the light of Terra."

traits.locale_text: «Gracia y fuerza de voluntad. Es una lástima que semejantes dones recaigan sobre alguien que nunca recibirá la luz de Terra».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Grace and strength of will. It is sad that such gifts have fallen to one whose soul will never be illuminated by the light of Terra."

languages.text: "Zarafet ve yılmaz irade... Böylesi lütufların, ruhu Terra'nın nuruyla asla aydınlanamayacak birine inmesi ne yazık."
languages.original_text: "Grace and strength of will. It is sad that such gifts have fallen to one whose soul will never be illuminated by the light of Terra."
